text: Landsberg is a town in the Saalekreis in the state of Saxony-Anhalt, Germany. The town is between the cities of Halle, about in the southwest, Leipzig, about in the southeast, and Bitterfeld-Wolfen, about in the north.The oldest known trace of early settlements in what is now Landsberg dates from the Neolithic. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Towns in Saxony-Anhalt
title: Landsberg, Saxony-Anhalt
